name: Vendetta (Firstrate Effex)
overview: Two types of mazes can be chosen, either Randomly Select, which gets you into a fast game, one of the 7 pre-generated mazes will be chosen. Or Randomly generate will create an all new one. Three game speeds, determining speed of the characters, this can be set for smoother movement or for added difficulty. When you fire the screen will flash white. When shot it will flash red. Move around the maze, searching for power ups and shooting your best buddy. Game is displayed on a top and bottom split screen.
